mapper.sql: id, modular_model, modular_name, loop_number, communication_mode, max_electric, load_electric, installation_mode, mem
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from nnlightctl_modular
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into nnlightctl_modular
id,
modular_model,
modular_name,
loop_number,
communication_mode,
max_electric,
load_electric,
installation_mode,
mem,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{modularModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modularName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loopNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{communicationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{maxElectric,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{loadElectric,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select from nnlightctl_modular
AND modular_model like concat('%',#{params.modularModel},'%')
AND modular_name like concat('%',#{params.modularName},'%')
AND loop_number like concat('%',#{params.loopNumber},'%')
AND communication_mode like concat('%',#{params.commicationMode},'%')
AND max_electric like contat('%',#{params.maxElectric},'%')
mapper.update:
update nnlightctl_modular
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modular_model = #{record.modularModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modular_name = #{record.modularName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loop_number = #{record.loopNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
communication_mode = #{record.communicationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_electric = #{record.maxElectric,jdbcType=INTEGER},
load_electric = #{record.loadElectric,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
installation_mode = #{record.installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mem = #{record.mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update nnlightctl_modular set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modular_model = #{record.modularModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modular_name = #{record.modularName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loop_number = #{record.loopNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, communication_mode = #{record.communicationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_electric = #{record.maxElectric,jdbcType=INTEGER}, load_electric = #{record.loadElectric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, installation_mode = #{record.installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem = #{record.mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update nnlightctl_modular
modular_model = #{modularModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modular_name = #{modularName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loop_number = #{loopNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
communication_mode = #{communicationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_electric = #{maxElectric,jdbcType=INTEGER},
load_electric = #{loadElectric,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
installation_mode = #{installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mem = #{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update nnlightctl_modular set modular_model = #{modularModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modular_name = #{modularName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loop_number = #{loopNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, communication_mode = #{communicationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_electric = #{maxElectric,jdbcType=INTEGER}, load_electric = #{loadElectric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, installation_mode = #{installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem = #{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
